Notes: Date and year are the Findings End Date in the dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division, which does not provide case opening or closing dates. The company name is the Legal Name provided by the dataset unless that field is blank, in which case the Trade Name is used. The dataset provides only one address and does not indicate whether it is the company headquarters address or the establishment address. The penalty amount is the total of civil monetary penalties and mandated back wages. The original dataset provides a breakdown.

Description: The Nuclear Regulatory Commission has proposed a $17,500 civil penalty against ZionSolutions LLC for the Zion nuclear power plant, for security-related violations stemming from a routine agency security inspection. The NRC conducted the inspection between June 2013 and February 2014. Agency inspectors looked at the security requirements for the permanently shutdown plant, conducted an onsite inspection and reviewed licensee-identified security violations. The plant took corrective actions to address the security violations, but to emphasize the importance of taking prompt and comprehensive corrective actions for the violations the NRC has proposed a $17,500 civil penalty. Details about security-related violations are not made public.
Info Source: http://pbadupws.nrc.gov/docs/ML1414/ML14148A274.pdf
